brand_identity.name: Jasubhai Chappal
brand_identity.ethos: Handcrafted Elegance, Traditional Roots, Modern Comfort
brand_identity.target_audience: Women who value tradition, quality, and style for weddings and daily wear.

usage.background: Cream/Off-white (#FDFBF7) for main pages to evoke warmth.
usage.primary: Deep Maroon (#800020) for CTAs, Footer, and active states.
usage.accent: Gold (#D4AF37) for borders, icons, and subtle highlights (not text).
usage.text: Charcoal (#1A1A1A) for readability, never pure black.

grid_system.collections: Bento Grid: Mix of col-span-1 (square) and col-span-2 (landscape) or row-span-2 (portrait) items.
grid_system.products: Responsive Grid: grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 xl:grid-cols-4 gap-8

header.style: Sticky, Glassmorphism (bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md). Logo centered or left. Minimal nav.

hero.style: Split layout or Full-width background with overlay. High emotional impact image.
hero.text_alignment: Left aligned or Centered with 'Cinzel' sub-heading.
hero.overlay: bg-gradient-to-r from-background/90 to-transparent (if split) or bg-black/30 (if full)

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-none px-8 py-3 font-serif transition-all duration-300 shadow-md hover:shadow-lg
buttons.secondary: border border-primary text-primary hover:bg-primary hover:text-white rounded-none px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300

product_card.style: Minimalist. Image dominates (aspect-[3/4]). Text below. No borders on card, just whitespace.
product_card.hover: Image zoom (scale-105) inside overflow-hidden container. 'Add to Cart' slides up from bottom.
product_card.typography: Title in Serif, Price in Sans (Gold color).

footer.style: Dark Maroon (#800020) background. Text in Gold/Cream. Multi-column.
footer.decoration: Add Indian mandala or paisley pattern opacity-10 overlay.

visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid Gold (#D4AF37) with opacity-30 for section dividers.
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle paper grain texture on background (optional) to feel 'handmade'.
visual_enhancers.icons: Use Phosphor Icons (Light weight) or Lucide (Stroke width 1.5). Gold color.

motion.page_load: Fade up with stagger for children.
motion.scroll: Parallax effect on hero images and 'About Us' section.
motion.hover: Smooth color transition (300ms). Buttons lift slightly.

hero.alt: Bride feet with mehndi and traditional chappals
hero.description: High emotional connection, showing culture and product context.

testimonials.name: Priya P.
testimonials.text: The embroidery is exquisite! Perfect for my wedding.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text-gray-800 or darker on cream backgrounds. Gold text only on Dark Maroon.
accessibility.labels: Aria-labels for all icon buttons (Cart, Wishlist, Menu).

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Setup Shadcn UI with the custom colors defined above (modify tailwind.config.js first).
3. Create a 'Layout' component that wraps pages with the Sticky Header and Footer.
4. Use the Bento Grid for the 'Featured Collections' on the Home Page.
5. Ensure the 'Product Detail Page' has a sticky right column for purchase actions.
6. Use the provided Image URLs. Do not leave placeholders.
7. Implement the 'Why Choose Us' section with the artisan image to highlight the 'Handmade' USP.
8. Maintain the 'Elegant & Feminine' vibeâ€”avoid sharp, brutalist edges. Use rounded-none or rounded-sm.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'Inter' font for headings; strictly use Playfair Display.
Use generous padding (py-16 minimum for sections).
Dark mode strategy: The brand feels best in Light/Cream, but if Dark mode is toggled, switch to Deep Maroon background with Gold text.
